definitions.definition: A pipe or channel for conveying water , etc.
A duct or tube into which electrical cables may be pulled; a type of raceway .
A means by which something is transmitted .
examples: The medium considered herself a conduit for messages from the spirit world.

definitions.definition: An investment vehicle that issues short-term commercial paper to finance long-term off-balance sheet bank assets.

main_definition: A pipe or channel for conveying water , etc.
secondary_definitions: A duct or tube into which electrical cables may be pulled; a type of raceway .
( figurative ) A means by which something is transmitted .
( finance ) An investment vehicle that issues short-term commercial paper to finance long-term off-balance sheet bank assets.
